body: I just start a game of ar urf and around 8:00 in game randomly ''attapmting to recconect'' pops up whille my internet connection isnt the problem with that and thise happend a lot and it keeps bugging me. can some one help me with thise?

replies.body: It seems like your network is losing connection specifically to the game server.  If it's happening a lot, I recommend testing in custom games until this is resolved.  Run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.
